title: Mumbai Bandra Bandstand crime: Man tries to kill girlfriend, bangs her head on rocks after being rejected
selftext: The police arrested the man, identified as Akash Mukherjee who assaulted Lubna Javed Sukte and attempted to drown her in a gutter. A case against him was registered under Section 307 of the Indian Penal Code (IPC).
